Package account

Class Account

java.lang.Object
account.Account
All Implemented Interfaces:
Accounts, Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Auctioner
public class Account extends Object implements Serializable, Accounts
The Account class represent account, used in auction this user is holding all functionalities and data needed to have in users. Class contains main parameters name, surname, login, password. But also array type of NFT representing products owned by user. Then we have account type representing type of account based on amount of money, money, points. Fraud counter detecting number of transactions. And ban and logged information.
See Also:
